citeinfo.title: Selected basin characteristics for all GAGES-II CONUS reference gages
Refinement of a Regression-Based Method for Prediction of Flow-Duration Curves of Daily Streamflow in the Conterminous United States

descript.abstract: This dataset contains selected basin characteristics from the GAGES-II dataset (https://water.usgs.gov/lookup/getspatial?gagesII_Sept2011) that were considered for use in regression equations for predicting flow-duration curves as well as additional variables that were constructed or derived from these basin characteristics. Descriptions of basin characteristics used in regression equations are provided (BCdescriptions.xlsx). Additional processing of the selected basin characteristics was done on a region-by-region basis, including deletion of variables with a large (greater than 50%) fraction of the same value (usually zero). A table indicating the basin characteristics considered for use in regression equations for each study region is provided (BCs_byRegion.xlsx). After transformation to reduce skewness and to convert to a similar range of values, these basin characteristics were used to fit regression equations for predicting FDCs. Basin characteristic selection and transformation were performed separately for each study region using all the USGS streamgages that were identified as being of “reference” quality in the GAGES-II dataset. Of the reference quality streamgages, only those having at least 10 complete water years (WYs) during the study period from WY1981 through WY2013 were used in regression model building; these are identified in the dataset. The basin characteristics are presented in their original units (unstransfBCs.new.xlsx) and as transformed (transfBCs.new.xlsx); a table specifying the transformations is provided (tranfBC_info.new.xlsx). Methods are fully described by Over and others (in review).
descript.purpose: Datasets were used to investigate refinements of a regression-based method for prediction of flow-duration curves for selected streamgages in the conterminous United States.

attracc.attraccr: No formal attribute accuracy tests were conducted

dataqual.logic: No formal logical accuracy tests were conducted
dataqual.complete: Data set is considered complete for the information presented, as described in the abstract. Users are advised to read the rest of the metadata record carefully for additional details.

horizpa.horizpar: No formal positional accuracy tests were conducted

vertacc.vertaccr: No formal positional accuracy tests were conducted

procstep.procdesc: The process used to create the final dataset is fully described in the accompanying report (Over and others, 2018).

enttyp.enttypd: Descriptions of basin characteristics used in regression equations

attr.attrdef: Variable names used in regression equations

attrdomv.udom: Variable names used in regression equations

attr.attrdef: A description of the basin characteristic used in the regression equations with data source identified if applicable. References for all cited data sources are provided on the second worksheet, BC_references.

attrdomv.udom: A description of the basin characteristic used in the regression equations with data source identified if applicable.

attr.attrdef: An identifier that specifies how the basin characteristic was used in regression equations

edom.edomvd: basin characteristic used directly in regression equations
basin characteristic not used directly in regression equations but in constructed variables
basin characteristic constructed from other GAGES-II basin characteristics

enttyp.enttypd: References for all data sources cited in the descriptions of basin characteristics used in regression equations. References obtained from GAGES-II dataset (https://water.usgs.gov/lookup/getspatial?gagesII_Sept2011).

attr.attrdef: Citation included in the descriptions of basin characteristics used in regression equations, found in the first worksheet, BC_descriptions.

attrdomv.udom: Citation included in the descriptions of basin characteristics used in regression equations

attr.attrdef: References for cited data sources as obtained from the GAGES-II dataset

attrdomv.udom: References for cited data sources as obtained from the GAGES-II dataset

attrdomv.udom: A description of the basin characteristic used in the regression equations with data source identified if applicable.

attr.attrdef: An indication whether the specified basin characteristic was used in regression equations in the corresponding study region

enttyp.enttypd: Basin characteristics provided in their original units. Worksheets are named according to the GAGES-II HUC02 study region.

attr.attrdefs: U.S. Geological Survey - National Water Information System

attrdomv.udom: BC variable names used in regression equations

attr.attrdef: First step: constant added to basin characteristics prior to transformation
Second step: transformation applied to basin characteristics

edom.edomvd: variable not transformed
variable transformed by raising it to the power of (3/2)
variable transformed by raising it to the power of (2/3)
variable transformed by raising it to the power of (1/2)
variable transformed by raising it to the power of (1/3)
variable transformed by raising it to the power of (1/5)
variable transformed by raising it to the power of (1/10)
variable transformed using common logarithm (base10)
variable transformed by raising it to the power of (2)
variable transformed by raising it to the power of (10)
variable transformed by raising it to the power of (3)
variable transformed by raising it to the power of (5)
variable transformed by using variable as exponent of 10

attr.attrdef: Third step: constant added to variables after transformation
Final step: constant which the variables are divided by

cntaddr.address: Denver Federal Center, Building 810, Mail Stop 302

distinfo.distliab: Unless otherwise stated, all data, metadata and related materials are considered to satisfy the quality standards relative to the purpose for which the data were collected. Although these data and associated metadata have been reviewed for accuracy and completeness and approved for release by the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), no warranty expressed or implied is made regarding the display or utility of the data for other purposes, nor on all computer systems, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty.
